alluxio.client.block

Class RetryHandlingBlockMasterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.AbstractClient
      • alluxio.AbstractMasterClient
        • alluxio.client.block.RetryHandlingBlockMasterClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client, BlockMasterClient, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public final class RetryHandlingBlockMasterClient
extends AbstractMasterClient
implements BlockMasterClient
    A wrapper for the thrift client to interact with the block master, used by alluxio clients. Since thrift clients are not thread safe, this class is a wrapper to provide thread safety, and to provide retries.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class alluxio.AbstractClient
